question: Who is the Artist of famous painting "The Old Guitarist"?
hints: "La Vie" is another painting by this Artist
aboutAnswer:
The Old Guitarist is an oil painting by Pablo Picasso created in late 1903 and early 1904.
It depicts an old, blind, haggard man with threadbare clothing weakly hunched over his guitar, playing in the streets of Barcelona, Spain.
It is currently on display at the Art Institute of Chicago as part of the Helen Birch Bartlett Memorial Collection.
